message.body: Julia, Gerri said lucky is 5wks Monday and was stepping on the end of the shoe. He said his soles are really thin and suggests a wider shoe and pads to help protect his feet, ok? :)
He's showing his front feet today and coming back for the hinds this week
ï¿¼Hi mommy! Uncle Gerri and aunt Tanya are taking care of me! See you soon!! Xoxo lucky!
Sounds good, thanks for the updates!!
